name: web-lab
desc: A collection of random CSS, Javascript, and HTML experiments.

name: vocab-quiz
desc: A small tool to help people studying for quizzes or tests that require understand of words and their definitions

name: autoAnswer
desc: A Minecraft server plugin that allows configurable automatic answers to common questions players ask

name: node-cal
desc: A simple nodejs calendar module that allows exporting of the iCal format or a custom JSON format.

name: EaaS (Errors as a Service)
desc: EaaS is the next revolution of computing. Give your program some of the best error messages from some of the industry's best error-generating programs (such as Windows) in a simple-to-use web API.

name: EasyDraw
desc: A small program to allow people to draw images and save/open them.

name: random
desc: A collection of random, semi-useful, scripts written in random languages.

name: gh-js
desc: gh-js is a super-simple wrapper for the GitHub API. It can get information on a user, that user's repos, gists, and a bit more.

name: PlayMusic
desc: A simple tool to play music. Through the use of taglib-sharp, PlayMusic also supports reading and writing IDv3 music tags.

name: PrintScreen
desc: A taskbar icon that allows saving the current contents of the screen to a file. PrintScreen was designed for touchscreens/tablets that do not have a keyboard atached, and as a result, cannot press the key combination typically needed to take a screenshot.

name: PwrSwitch
desc: A simple program that lets someone easily switch power plans from the taskbar (and to open the power options control panel). A more efficient way compared to the native way that Windows provides.

name: url-short
desc: A simple but good-looking url shortner built upon the Flask framework. url-short uses redis for backend storage, and supports lookups for amount of clicks.

name: mu
desc: A simple web server that supports serving markdown files and parsing them on-the-fly, with basic caching support.

name: athena
desc: A barely-functional IRC logging bot written in C.

name: random2
desc: A collection of random, semi-useful, scripts and programs written in random languages.

name: paste
desc: A simple pastebin written in Python built upon the Flask framework.

name: libDraw
desc: A simple library for BareMetal-OS (written in C) that allows drawing of basic shapes.

name: Backpack
desc: A simple Minecraft server plugin that gives players a backpack.

name: a
desc: A customized version of BareMetal OS

name: leek
desc: A simple Java game engine that currently uses AWT.

name: nu
desc: A simple static site generator written in C and intended for fast and easy creation of a blog-style website from markdown files with low setup requirements
